Indian.name: Masala Dosa
Indian.description: Crispy South Indian rice–lentil crepes stuffed with spiced potato masala, served with sambar and coconut chutney.
procedure: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek for 6 hours.
Prepare potato masala with onions, curry leaves, turmeric, and boiled potatoes.
Spread dosa batter on hot tawa, add masala, fold, and serve with chutney/sambar.

Indian.name: Palak Paneer
Indian.description: Paneer cubes cooked in smooth spinach gravy flavored with garlic and spices.
procedure: Add spices and spinach puree, simmer.
Add paneer cubes and finish with cream.

Indian.name: Chole (Chana Masala)
Indian.description: Punjabi-style chickpeas cooked in a spicy onion–tomato gravy.
procedure: Cook onions, ginger-garlic, and tomatoes with spices.

Indian.name: Vegetable Biryani
Indian.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with spiced mixed vegetables and saffron.
procedure: Layer rice and vegetables, add saffron milk.

Indian.name: Baingan Bharta
Indian.description: Smoky roasted eggplant mashed and cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
procedure: Roast brinjal on flame, peel and mash.
Sauté onions, ginger, garlic, and tomatoes.
Add mashed brinjal, spices, and cook.

Indian.name: Pav Bhaji
Indian.description: Spicy mashed vegetable curry served with butter-toasted bread.
procedure: Cook onion, capsicum, and tomato with pav bhaji masala.
Mash in vegetables, simmer with butter.

Indian.name: Idli with Sambar
Indian.description: Steamed rice–lentil cakes with a tangy vegetable-lentil stew.
procedure: Prepare sambar with toor dal, tamarind, and vegetables.

Indian.name: Aloo Paratha
Indian.description: Whole-wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced potato mash, cooked on a tawa.
procedure: Boil and mash potatoes, add spices.
Stuff into dough balls, roll, and cook on tawa with ghee.

Indian.name: Vegetable Pulao
Indian.description: Quick one-pot rice dish cooked with mixed vegetables and mild spices.
procedure: Heat oil, sauté spices, onions, and ginger-garlic.
Cook with water until rice is done.

Indian.name: Gulab Jamun
Indian.description: Deep-fried milk-solid dumplings soaked in cardamom–rose sugar syrup.
procedure: Prepare dough with khoya and flour.
Shape into balls, fry until golden.
Soak in warm sugar syrup with cardamom and rose water.

Chinese.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
Chinese.description: Stir-fried rice with soy sauce, vegetables, and spring onions.
procedure: Heat oil, add garlic and vegetables.
Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
Mix in rice, stir-fry on high flame.

Chinese.name: Veg Manchurian
Chinese.description: Deep-fried vegetable balls simmered in a tangy soy-garlic sauce.
procedure: Make balls from grated cabbage, carrot, and flour.
Prepare sauce with garlic, soy, chili sauce.
Simmer balls in sauce and serve.

Chinese.name: Hakka Noodles
Chinese.description: Chinese-style stir-fried noodles with mixed vegetables and sauces.
procedure: Heat oil, sauté garlic and vegetables.

Chinese.name: Mapo Tofu (Veg)
Chinese.description: Soft tofu cooked in a spicy, garlicky sauce with Sichuan peppercorns.
procedure: Prepare sauce with garlic, ginger, soy, chili paste, Sichuan pepper.

Chinese.name: Spring Rolls
Chinese.description: Crispy fried rolls stuffed with spiced vegetables.
procedure: Prepare filling with cabbage, carrot, noodles, and sauces.
Fill spring roll sheets and roll tightly.

Chinese.name: Hot and Sour Soup
Chinese.description: Spicy, tangy soup with vegetables, soy, and vinegar.
procedure: Season with soy, vinegar, chili paste.

Chinese.name: Kung Pao Vegetables
Chinese.description: Stir-fried vegetables with peanuts, chili, and soy-based sauce.
procedure: Mix in peanuts and toss well.

Chinese.name: Chili Garlic Noodles
Chinese.description: Spicy noodles tossed with garlic and chili paste.
procedure: Heat oil, sauté garlic and chilies.

Chinese.name: Stir-Fried Broccoli with Garlic Sauce
Chinese.description: Healthy stir-fried broccoli in soy–garlic sauce.
procedure: Stir-fry garlic, soy, and cornstarch slurry.

Chinese.name: Steamed Veg Dumplings
Chinese.description: Soft dumplings stuffed with mixed vegetables and served with chili sauce.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Tacos
Mexican.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with beans, salsa, and grilled vegetables.
procedure: Prepare filling with beans, peppers, onions.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Enchiladas
Mexican.description: Corn tortillas stuffed with beans and cheese, baked with chili sauce.
procedure: Stuff tortillas with beans and vegetables.
Roll and place in baking dish.
Top with enchilada sauce and cheese.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Quesadilla
Mexican.description: Grilled flour tortilla stuffed with cheese and vegetables.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Burrito
Mexican.description: Large tortilla stuffed with rice, beans, salsa, and vegetables.
procedure: Fill with rice, beans, and vegetables.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Nachos
Mexican.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with beans, cheese, jalapeños, and salsa.
procedure: Top with beans, cheese, salsa, and jalapeños.
Bake or microwave until cheese melts.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Fajitas
Mexican.description: Grilled peppers, onions, and mushrooms served with tortillas.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Tamales
Mexican.description: Corn dough filled with beans and vegetables, steamed in corn husks.

Mexican.name: Chiles Rellenos (Veg)
Mexican.description: Roasted poblano peppers stuffed with cheese or beans, battered and fried.

Mexican.name: Vegetarian Tortilla Soup
Mexican.description: Tomato-based soup with crispy tortilla strips, beans, and avocado.
procedure: Serve with tortilla strips and avocado.

Mexican.name: Mexican Rice
Mexican.description: Fragrant rice cooked with tomatoes, onion, and mild spices.
procedure: Sauté onion, garlic, and tomato paste.
